text:
Message 557 of 4024
No. I did not do it. Why would I have to call them for something you did? Mind fixing? I’ve been trying really hard all day to make you whole for
anything you needed. Now you turned off my Xfinity, say you can’t see it (how do I know?) and are arguing about our sons mental health like you
make all the decisions. I’ve tried all day, bent over backwards and it feels like you are just popping on me. I asked so many times to help. Now it’s my
problem because whatever you did?
BTW- if you really think a help desk is a techie, and does anything more than type your into a LLM chat bot to regurgitate it to you I’d be happy to
explain why they make minimum wage in 3rd world countries.
Sent:01/19/2024 at 04:20 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/19/2024 at 04:29 PM)
Subject:Re: Kirkland xfinity account
Message 558 of 4024
It is slow, inefficient, we get wound up and we are not
getting a anywhere. If you won’t fix the account you took over or work with me on ADs health decision in a more reasonable way, I’m not sure what I
can do. We have gone back and forth on this trash app for over an hour of our life we will never get back. You clearly are
making every decision (including the one to use this) and it’s not getting us anywhere. Please let me know when you want to work with me, share
decision making and work more effectively.
Sent:01/19/2024 at 04:24 PM

Subject:This is dumb and pointless
